summary: The diff implements all six requirements with comprehensive theme updates, case studies, and resume optimization. The green/black/white color system is fully applied across all components, both case studies are implemented with complete structured data, and resume loading is optimized with preload and direct linking. The profile photo implementation is present in Hero.tsx with circular crop and shadow. All acceptance criteria appear to be satisfied based on the visible code changes.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify removing any sections. It explicitly states to maintain section order and not add/remove sections beyond specified case studies. The diff shows WhyWorkWithMe was removed from App.tsx, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added complete structured content for three experience blocks in About.tsx including PrashantAdvait Foundation
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify updating the About/Experience section content beyond the general theme changes. The detailed content for PrashantAdvait Foundation and the specific structure of experience blocks were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 'Client Testimonials' section with carousel functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention adding or modifying testimonials. The constraints explicitly state not to add new sections beyond specified case studies.
